mcq.statement: Why could the federation portion of the Government of India Act, 1935 not take place before the 1945 Central Elections?

options.a: Princely States were unwilling to join

mcq.one_liner: The federation portion of the Government of India Act, 1935 could not be implemented before the 1945 Central Elections because the princely states were unwilling to join it, making the federation unworkable.
